column2: "Thanks for the request the other day. Matoi also looked really happy. ...since you did so well for us."
"Oh, umm, so, right. I'm probably making too much of it, but I'm a little worried about Matoi's condition."
"Since hearing that the ruins have been discovered, it's like she sometimes gets lost in thought or something..."
"If she sees an actual fragment or something of the ruins, don't you think it might help her get her memory back?"
"I don't mind if it's when you're not busy! I beg you to do it for the sake of Matoi!"
